actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.
Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Hollings without amendment. With written report No. 100-419.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 791.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the department in which the United States Coast Guard is operating to cause the vessel M/V Polar Ice to be documented as a vessel of the United States so as to be entitled to engage in the coastwise trade.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to cause a named vessel to be documented as a vessel of the United States entitled to engage in the coastwise trade.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the department in which the United States Coast Guard is operating to cause the vessel M/V Polar Ice to be documented as a vessel of the United States so as to be entitled to engage in the coastwise trade.
